text: Musa naboola mbu; “Nyasaye wefu omulesi, toto ewe wahelesia Firauni nende abakhongo bebe ebirone nende omwandu khubulamu bwo khushialo buno, Khulwako bakoselinjiakhwo Abandu khunjila yiyio. Nyasaye wefu Omulesi, salania omwandu kwabu ne oboye emioyo chiabu, balasuubila tawe okhula balole eshinyasio eshilulu.”
